projects.name: Bitcoin Hyper
projects.desc: Bitcoin Hyper is a Bitcoin fork that integrates a hybrid Proof of Stake/Nakamoto consensus and the Solana Virtual Machine (SVM), enabling smart contracts, DeFi, and NFTs on a Bitcoin-backed chain. It aims to combine Bitcoin's security with Solana-level speed and programmability, targeting both traditional and new crypto users.

projects.name: Remittix
projects.desc: Remittix is developing a blockchain-powered solution for cross-border payments, focusing on reducing processing times and fees while integrating with fiat gateways. Its primary use case is to improve remittance services in regions underserved by traditional finance.

projects.name: Hexydog
projects.desc: Hexydog is introducing blockchain technology to the pet care market, aiming to streamline commerce and services in a $250 billion industry. Its clear implementation strategy and niche focus set it apart from more generalized crypto projects.

projects.name: Vault AI
projects.desc: Vault AI merges artificial intelligence with DeFi tools on its own native blockchain, aiming to provide advanced financial products and analytics powered by AI. The project is in presale and targets early adopters interested in the intersection of AI and decentralized finance.

projects.name: Qubetics
projects.desc: Qubetics focuses on tokenizing real estate and intellectual property, enabling fractional ownership and liquidity for traditionally illiquid assets. The project has raised $14.5M in its presale and is positioning itself as a leader in real-world asset tokenization.

projects.name: Web3Bay
projects.desc: Web3Bay is an e-commerce platform that leverages blockchain to offer users 5% discounts when paying with its native 3BAY token. It aims to disrupt online retail by integrating crypto payments and loyalty incentives.

projects.name: Cogni AI
projects.desc: Cogni AI is an AI-powered blockchain project allocating 50% of its tokens to presale. It focuses on natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV) applications, aiming to bring advanced AI capabilities to decentralized environments.

projects.name: Lightchain AI
projects.desc: Lightchain AI introduces a novel 'Proof of Intelligence' consensus mechanism and reserves 40% of its tokens for early investors. The project integrates AI into its blockchain infrastructure to enhance security and efficiency.

projects.name: Solaxy
